content: {"name": "Meals on Wheels of Staten Island", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- Call 7189816226 ext 177 if intrested in meal deliveries.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.mealsonwheelsofstatenisland.com/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "304 Port Richmond Ave", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10302", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.6341816, "longitude": -74.1362453}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 727-4435", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors Only"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No food distribution - marked unavailable"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Meal delivery available for seniors"}]}
